result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Mary Marie Bengtson

records.addlTxt: Statewide         JRG signed 10/10/22 - E: DA, Atty & Email: Jail & Dispatch. eif

10:31 AM Mary Marie Bengtson does not appear in Court,  Atty Liesl E. Nelson, ADA Joseph M. Schieffer for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Nelson has no information why DE does not appear. ADA Schieffer is requesting a warrant body only. Court will authorize warrant Statewide body only.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Maintain Absolute Sobriety. 
Not to possess controlled substances without a valid prescription.
Court finds DE freely, intelligently and knowingly waives constitutional right to a preliminary hearing.
records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
3:07 PM Defendant Mary Marie Bengtson appeared in custody from Jail via video,  Atty Liesl Nelson appears by phone, ADA Joseph M. Schieffer appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and constitutional rights. Defendant understands charges, possible penalties and constitutional rights. Waives reading. Court reviews DE's rights. ADA Schieffer is asking for a $2,500.00 signature bond w/conditions of Absolute sobriety, no contact with known drug dealers & Not to possess controlled substances, no objection except No contact w/known drug dealers. Court orders bond as requested but without the No Contact w/known drug dealers. Waive time limits. Court adjourned at 3:20 pm
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on October 10, 2022 at 10:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Mary Marie Bengtson
Current: 917 Southside Drive, Woodville, WI 54028 United States  (Effective: 09-20-2022)
Prior: 314 1/2 River St # 3, Colfax, WI 54730 
per DE in court. eif
